alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Knox; Morgan; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 14 at 9:46PM CDT until August 14 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Morgan County in east Tennessee... North central Knox County in east Tennessee... Central Anderson County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 1130 PM EDT. * At 1046 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oliver Springs, or near Oak Ridge, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oak Ridge, Clinton, Oliver Springs, Norris, Powell, Norris Dam State Park, Andersonville, and Coalfield. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 117 and 126. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
